greeting.title: Future innovator!
greeting.motivationalPhrase: The world of STEM awaits your brilliance. Shine on!

greeting.title: Tech explorer!
greeting.motivationalPhrase: Embrace your curiosity and unlock new possibilities in STEM.

greeting.title: STEM trailblazer!
greeting.motivationalPhrase: Your journey to success starts now. Let's go!

greeting.title: Science enthusiast!
greeting.motivationalPhrase: Never stop learning and growing in the fascinating world of STEM.

greeting.title: Problem-solver!
greeting.motivationalPhrase: Your skills and passion can make a real difference in STEM.

greeting.title: Stargazer!
greeting.motivationalPhrase: Reach for the stars and achieve your STEM dreams.
